K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:479a-13: bdag cag so so'i gnas su log la rang rang gi nus tshad la dpag pa'i zhal zas bzang po'i bye brag mang po bshams te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:479a-16: de nas skye bo de dag thams cad rings pa rings par rang rang gi khyim du song nas mtshan mo'i ring de la dri zhim la ro bda' ba'i zhal zas bza' btung sna tshogs sbyar zhing dri zhim po'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:479b-3: ba dan la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:479b-4: rol mo pheg rdob pa'i bye brag mang po bshams nas lam rnams su nye bar ltags te de bzhin gshegs pa bsgugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:479b-5: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan des lnga len gyi ljongs su 'khor mang po la chos ston cing bzhugs pa'i skabs shig glo bur du rin po che sna bdun gyis spud pa'i bum pa so shing dang bcas pa zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:479b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis bum pa so shing dang bcas pa gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:479b-7: zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas kyang rtsibs stong 'khor los mtshan pa'i phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang ste bum pa so shing dang bcas pa phyag tu bzhes la cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:479b-8: de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyis ngo mtshar du gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:479b-10: bkra shis pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta bu phyogs gang nas byung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:479b-11: yul phyogs gang zhig tu bcom ldan 'das gdan 'dren pa'i mtshan ma zhig yin snyam zer to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480a-0: de'i tshe 'khor gyi nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam dag dam pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba zhig 'dus par gyur te stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi @480a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480a-1: zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing g-yas skor du lan gsum bskor ba byas thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480a-3: bkra shis pa'i mtshan ma 'di phyogs gang nas byung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480a-4: bum pa so shing dang bcas pa'i rgyu mtshan ci lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol zhes gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480a-7: bum pa so shing dang bcas pa 'di ba tha ri'i grong khyer chen po nas 'ongs pa ste sa phyogs der nga spyan 'dren pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480a-8: rnam dag dam pa'i blo gros /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480a-10: nga'i phyag phyir bsod snyoms la 'gro bar 'dod pa rnams tshul shing longs shig ces 'grems shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480a-11: sang snga bar ba tha ri'i grong khyer chen por rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro'o zhes gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480a-12: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam dag dam pa'i blo gros kyis tshul shing bzung nas 'dus pa'i 'khor byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad la brim zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480a-14: rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul gyi yul la 'jug nus pa rnams tshul shing longs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis sang snga bar pa tha ri'i grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms la cha'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480b-0: byang chub sems @480b dpa' rnam dag dam pa'i blo gros kyis de ltar tshul shing brims tshar nas slar bcom ldan 'das la gsol zhing bcom ldan 'das gdan 'dren par bskul to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480b-1: de nas de'i sang zhogs snga bar de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis chos gos gsum legs par gsol nas dpal dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480b-2: gzi brjid kyi rgyan mchog tu 'bar zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480b-3: 'dus pa'i 'khor mang po dang bcas rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par rol pa'i stobs kyis bar snang la 'phags te lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480b-10: lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor gyi tshogs mang pos rol mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480b-11: sil snyan sna tshogs dkrol zhing bdug spos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480b-16: rgyan la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i bye brag sna tshogs kyis mchod pas yongs su bskor ba zhin par nam mkha'i lam nas yud tsam gcig la pa tha ri'i grong khyer chen por phebs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su padma'i snying po seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480b-18: 'khor thams cad kyang rang rang gi sprul pa'i padma'i khyim gyi theg pa dang bcas 'dus te 'khod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:480b-19: de nas pa tha ri'i grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad rab tu dga' zhing mgu nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481a-1: bshams pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481a-2: 'khor byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481a-3: lha klu sde brgyad kyi tshogs thams cad la mchod pa byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481a-4: gdugs tshod kyi dus la babs pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481a-5: kha dog dri ro phun sum tshogs pa'i zhal zas sna tshogs 'bul zhing brim ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481a-6: ci bde bar tshim par byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481a-7: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pas gdugs tshod legs par bzhes nas bkru bshal mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481a-8: spyod lam dag par mdzad la 'khor rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas gral stan la go rim 'tsham par 'khod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481a-9: de nas pa tha ri'i grong khyer gyi skye bo de dag thams cad slar yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag dang bskor ba byas nas don gyi rgyu las brtsams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481a-10: sba ma'i gnas tshul 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481a-13: grong khyer 'di'i shar sgo'i phyi rol na aa su ri zhes bya ba'i skyed tshal zhig yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481a-14: grong khyer de'i nang na srin po'i bu mo lha min mdzes ma zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481a-17: khro zhing gtum pa gcig gnas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481a-18: rgyun par khye'u bu mo rnams kyi mdangs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481b-0: gzi brjid 'phrog cing srog kyang 'phrog par byed pas bdag cag rnams nyin mtshan med par @481b 'jigs pas nyen te sdug bsngal zhing bde ba'i go skabs cung zad kyang mi thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba chen pos dgongs la sdug bsngal 'di bsal ba'i thabs bstan du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481b-2: bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol zhes gsol ba btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481b-3: de ltar gsol ba btab pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan des skye bo'i tshogs de dag la brtse ba'i dgongs pas zhal gyis bzhes te cang mi gsung bar gnang nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481b-4: 'dzum pa mdzad pas zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog brgya stong du 'phros /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481b-5: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su khebs pas sems can thams cad dbugs phyung bar mdzad cing khyad par aa su ri'i skyed mos tshal de rdzu 'phrul gyi 'od zer me'i phung pos bsreg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481b-6: kun tu rab tu sreg go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481b-7: der gnas pa'i srin po'i bu mo 'khor khri khrag mang po dang bcas tshom bu tshom bur phral nas phyogs bzhir 'thor zhing rgyug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481b-8: skad chen pos du zhing cho de 'debs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481b-9: kye ma kyi hud bdag cag rnams su la skyabs su 'gro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481b-10: su zhig gis sdug bsngal 'di las skyob nus zer zhing 'o dod 'bod de du bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:481b-11: de nas par snang na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:482a-1: bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi drung du song la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su song na sdug bsngal 'di las thar bar gyur te bde pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:482a-2: yid bde ba 'tho ba par 'gyur ro zhes smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:482a-3: de nas lha min mdzes ma 'khor khri phrag mang po dang bcas rings pa rings par pa tha ri'i grong khyer gyi sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor ga la ba der phyin nas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:482a-5: bdag cag rnams bskyab tu gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:482a-10: deng phyin chad bdag cag gis sems can la gnod pa mi bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:482a-11: sems can la 'tshe bar mi bgyid do zhes gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:482a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar dgongs pas zhal gyis bzhes nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:482a-13: byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum rnam par rol pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi byin rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:482a-14: de las langs te byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:482a-15: de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:482a-16: gzungs sngags kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:482b-0: de na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad lham me lham @482b mer mngon sum du snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:482b-1: sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi 'khor rnams la chos ston pa yang lhang lhang thos par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:482b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas so so'i zhing na bzhugs bzhin mgrin gcig dbyangs gcig gis legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:482b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan khyed kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs gsungs pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:482b-6: legs par gsungs so zhes gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:482b-7: de nas srin mo lha min mdzes ma 'khor dang bcas pa btul zhing dge ba bcu'i lam la 'god /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:482b-8: skye bo'i tshogs grangs med pa mang po yang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la 'god do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:482b-9: de nas grong khyer de nyid rin po che sna bdun las grub par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:482b-10: rin po che sna bdun gyi char yang babs so; ;dzambu gling gi skye rgu thams cad kyang sdug bsngal med pa'i bde ba phun sum tshogs pa la longs spyod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:482b-12: nga de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u lo bdun lon pa zhig ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:483a-0: gzungs sngags 'di thos pas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i bstan pa la rnam par dag pa'i dad pa thob cing da lta bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes pa @483a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:483a-6: khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na srin mo lha min mdzes ma zhes bya bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:483a-7: de'i dus dge ba'i sems ma bzung zhing sems can mang po la gnod pa byas pa'i 'bras bu bskal pa grangs med du mar ngan song myul sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa myongs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:483a-8: mthar de bzhin gshegs pa de la skyabs su song zhing bslab pa bzung bas da lta bram ze shing s'a la chen po lta bur skyes shing shes rab che la longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:483a-9: 'on kyang las kyi lhag mas bu tsha med par gyur pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:483a-11: de'i dus kyi pa tha ri'i grong khyer na gnas pa skye bo de dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:483a-12: da lta nga'i 'khor du byung ba'i lha klu gnod sbyin dri za lha min mkha' lding mi'am ci la sogs pa'i 'dus pa'i tshoms chen po 'di dag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:483a-13: bram ze chen po; khyod de'i tshe de'i dus kyi lha min mdzes ma'i 'khor khri phrag mang po de dag da lta gzhan su dag yin nam snyam pa'i yid gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:483a-18: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi lha min mdzes ma'i 'khor khri phrag mang po ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:483b-0: da lta nga'i 'khor 'dus pa chen po'i nang du byung ba'i @483b bram ze dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:483b-2: rig byed smra ba rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:483b-4: rtog ge pa gzhan dag sgyu rtsal shes rigs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:483b-5: dur khrod na gnas pa'i brtul zhugs can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:483b-7: glang ru'i brtul zhugs can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:483b-8: ri su lan gnas pa'i brtul zhugs can 'di dag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:483b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas de dag gi sngon gyi sbyor ba rnams de ltar bshad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:483b-10: de nas 'khor 'dus pa chen po de dag gis sngon gyi sbyor ba'i rgyu rkyen de lta bu thos nas shin tu ngo mtshar bar gyur te dga' zhing mgu nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:483b-15: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:483b-18: ba dan la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i bye brag sna tshogs bsnams nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing g-yas skor du bskor ba lan gsum byas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:483b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshig gcig gis mthun par gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:483b-21: bdag cag la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:483b-22: rtog pa'i rgyal po byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:484a-1: pa'i rgyal po de ni sems can thams cad kyi dmigs bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:484a-3: khyad par du yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya'i tha ma la babs pa'i tshe sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:484a-4: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:484a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gnang nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:484a-7: zhal 'dzum pa mdzad pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs 'phros /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:484a-8: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gsal bar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:484a-9: de dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du lham me lham mer snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:484a-10: de dag gi chos bshad pa yang lhang nge lhang nger thos par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:484a-11: gnas de nyid rin po che'i ljon shing rtsa ba sdong po yal ga lo 'dab me tog 'bras bu rnams rin po che sna bdun las grub pa yid du 'ong ba'i lha'i shing sha stag gi tshal chen pos phyogs mtshams brgyan par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:484a-12: dzambu gling gi sems can thams cad kyang lha'i bde ba la longs spyod par gyur pa la sogs pa'i rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rol pa'i byin rlabs kyi snang ba 'jig rten 'di na mngon sum du gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:484b-0: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal @484b gzhon nur gyur pas tshul de dag mthong nas dga' bas 'dzum pa mdzad cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:484b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis te phyag 'tshal zhing lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:484b-3: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:484b-4: bde ba rgya chen po rgyun mi 'chad pa 'byung ba'i phyir rtog pa'i rgyal po byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:484b-5: bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol zhes gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:484b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar zhal gyis bzhes nas sangs rgyas thams cad la nye bar blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:484b-7: snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing khams ma lus par mngon sum du snang bar gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:484b-8: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa thams cad mda' 'ben gcig gis tsam du nye bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:484b-9: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad mgrin gcig dbyangs gcig gis 'di skad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:484b-12: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa khyed kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di gsung bar brtsams pa shin tu legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:485a-1: rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:485a-2: da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa khyed kyis gsungs pa'i dus la bab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:485a-3: bdag cag thams cad kyang rjes su yi rang ngo zhes gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:485a-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lhung bzed gcig bsnams nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad der bsdus te bcom ldan 'das la phul to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:485a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas phyag tu bzhes la mdun gyi nam mkhar bor to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:485a-6: de nas lhung bzed des nam mkha'i dbyings kyi khyon gang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:485a-7: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su gang bar gyur nas de dag thams cad kyang mgrin gcig dbyangs gcig gis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:485a-11: de dag thams cad re re'i spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:485b-0: sh'akya thub pa so so'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal lhung bzed 'bul bzhin pa re re @485b snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:485b-1: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:485b-3: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'ubs kyis 'dus shing rnam par spros pa 'di su'i don du yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:485b-6: ci'i phyir 'od zer 'gyed la rnam par 'phrul pa 'di bstan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:485b-8: ci phyag na rdo rje khyed kyis 'od kyi snang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:485b-9: rdzu 'phrul gyi rgyu rkyen mi shes sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:485b-10: phyag na rdo rjes smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:485b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:485b-14: rnam par spros pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di 'dra bdag gis sngon chad ma mthong ma thos shing de ring bdag la thog mar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:485b-15: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:485b-16: rdo rje gsor zhing bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:485b-17: chos gang zhig bstan par brtsams pas deng 'dir sngon chad mthong ma myong thos ma myong ba'i rdzu 'phrul ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba 'di lta bu zhig ston /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:485b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:486a-0: skad cig yud tsam na mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs @486a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:486a-1: ma thag rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'i mchod rten dpangs su dpag tshad bdun stong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:486a-2: rgyar dpag tshad lnga stong yod pa zhig sa brtol te byung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:486a-3: mchod rten de ni lha'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis spud pa 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:486a-4: lha rdzas kyi gos kyi dar dpyangs 'phyang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:486a-5: nor bu rin po che mu tig gi dra bas khebs shing rin po che'i phyang 'phrul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:486a-7: dril bu'i g-yer kha las snyan pa'i sgra skad sna tshogs byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:486a-8: de'i tshe bar snang nas lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas lag na mchod pa'i yo byad sna tshogs thogs pa babs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:486a-9: rin po che'i mchod rten de la mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:486a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la mchod rten de'i sgo phyed par bsgos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:486a-13: sgo phyed par bsgos pa dang byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje sku las ye shes kyi me'i phung po rab tu 'bar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:486a-14: rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:486a-15: lag na rdo rje gsor zhing zhal khro gnyer bsdus pa'i nyams can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:486a-16: 'jigs su rung ba'i dpa' byad dang ldan pa des rin po che'i mchod rten de'i drung du song nas phyag g-yas pa brkyang ste mchod rten de'i sgo 'phar rab tu phye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:486b-0: phyes pa dang de'i nang na dzambu chu bo'i @486b gser las grub pa'i seng ge'i khri rin po che sna bdun gyis spa ba lha rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs kyi khengs dang ldan pa'i stan la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:486b-1: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu rgyas pa'i gser zhal mchog tu dpa' ba'i 'od zer rgyal mtshan gyi tog ces bya ba bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs bzhin pa snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:486b-2: de nas sangs rgyas shin tu rgyas pa'i gser zhal mchog tu dpa' ba'i 'od zer rgyal mtshan gyi tog des 'di skad ces bsngags pa mdzad do; ;bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:486b-8: don dam par chos thams cad 'du 'bral yong ye mi mnga' bzhin 'jig rten 'di na rdzu 'phrul ngo mtshar 'di lta bu bstan pa 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:486b-9: sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la yang ma byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:486b-10: da lta bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa khyed kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:487a-0: bcom ldan 'das khyed kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir rjes su brtse bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams @487a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:487a-1: cad kyi sku mngon sum du snang ba'i rnam par rol ba'i rdzu 'phrul bstan pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:487a-3: byin rlabs las byung ba lags pas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs 'chad pa'i dus la bab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:487a-4: de skad ces gsungs pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:487a-6: rtog pa'i rgyal bo byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:487a-7: aom na mo bha ga ba te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:487a-9: pra bh'a sa ke tu m'urdha ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:487a-12: na mo bha ga b'a te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:487a-22: pra ha ra pra ha ra /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:487a-27: gu ne gu na ba te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:487b-15: de bzhin du byug pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:487b-24: me tog gi char de yang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:488a-18: de ltar dzambu gling 'dir ngo mtshar ba'i rdzu 'phrul byung zhing sems can thams cad phan pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:489a-13: de bzhin du ngas lha'i mig gis bltas pas /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:490b-9: tshul ji lta bur byang chub rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs 'di la brten nas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskrun par mdzad /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:491a-2: me tog legs par bkram zhing mchod pa yang bsham /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:491a-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:491b-14: lha khang gi gandho la'i nang bcug pa'am /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:492a-3: gdugs kyi nang du gzungs 'di bcug na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:492a-8: sha'i ring bsrel de dag thams cad la mchod rten byas pa'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:492a-9: mchod rten zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas dkyil 'khor yin no //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:492a-16: de lta bu'i mchod rten de dag la me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:492a-17: bdug spos la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad ci 'byor pas mchod pa byed pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:492a-18: thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:492a-19: lan gcig tsam bskor ba byas kyang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:492b-3: bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi bu lon gzhal du med cing bgrangs su ma mchis pa'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:492b-10: mchod rten 'ga' zhig mchod par gyur pa ma yin gyi /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:492b-16: byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du lus rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:492b-18: slar yang mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:492b-20: gzungs sngags 'di ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:492b-22: skye bo gang la la zhig gis lder bzo'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:492b-25: rin po che'i rigs kyi rdo la brkos sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:492b-26: dri bzang gi sman 'dam las byas pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:493a-5: de dag gang yang rung bas mchod rten nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:493a-8: dar dkar po la gzungs sngags 'di bris nas mchod rten nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:493a-9: sku gzugs kyi nang du bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:493a-12: bkur sti rim gro byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:493a-20: rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi tshad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis gzhal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:493a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pas dpag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:493a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pas sngar bstan pa'i ring bsrel gyi grangs ji snyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:493a-23: rgya mtsho chen po'i chu thigs ji tsam grangs dang mnyam pa'i mchod rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:493a-25: dge slong ngam; dge slong ma'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:493a-30: rigs kyi bu mo des mchod rten na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:493a-31: sku gzugs gzungs 'dis snying po can gcig la phyag bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:493a-32: mchod pa byas par mi 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:493a-34: sku gzugs de snyed pa phyag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:493b-0: mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams kyi @493b 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:493b-6: phan yon chen po dang ldan pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:493b-8: nus stobs chen po dang ldan pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:493b-9: gzungs sngags 'di'i ming tsam 'dzin pas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa bskyed cing bsod nams dpag tu med pa thob pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:493b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:493b-16: dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa rigs kyi bu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:493b-17: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po yongs su rdzogs par kun nas bslangs pas /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:493b-22: bsnyen bkur byed par 'dod par gyur tshe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:493b-24: rigs kyi bu mo des rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di yi ger bris nas za ma tog tu bcug la nyin re bzhin dri bzang gi chus khrus 'bul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:494a-2: dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa rigs kyi bu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:494a-3: rigs kyi bu mo de ni 'das pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:494a-7: rigs kyi bu mo de la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:494a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis lung ston par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:494a-9: de dag thams cad kyis dbugs dbyung bar 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:494b-3: phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:494b-4: cho ga tshul bzhin du nyams su len pa rnams la byin gyis rlobs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:494b-5: 'dod pa rnams bsgrub par byos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:494b-6: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:494b-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:494b-8: gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:494b-9: rgyal po chen po sde bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:494b-11: bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' yang dag par nos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:494b-12: rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di 'chang ba'i skyes bu chen po de bdag cag gis bsrung ba dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:494b-16: mgon med pa skyabs med par gyur pa rnams kyang dbugs dbyung zhing mgo 'dren par bgyid cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:494b-17: byang chub snying po la bzhugs shing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur ba'i bar rnam par thams cad du bsrung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:494b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:494b-20: gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495a-0: rgyal po chen po sde bzhi la legs so zhes bya ba @495a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495a-3: khyod cag gis dam bcas pa de bzhin du byos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa chen po la thun mong du bka' stsal pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495a-6: dngos grub thams cad ster ba /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495a-9: lus dag par bkrus la gos gsar gtsang ma gon nas nyin re bzhin brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495a-11: tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495a-12: nad thams cad ring du spangs bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495a-13: 'phags pa'i sa la gnas pa thams cad kyis skyob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495a-14: gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495a-15: rgyal po chen po sde bzhi 'khor dang bcas pas rtag tu bsrung zhing skyob ba dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495a-18: skye zhing skye bar rin po che'i padma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495a-19: mngal gyi skye gnas yongs su spang ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495a-20: skye ba thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495b-0: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na dmyal bar lhung nges kyi sdig pa'i las thams cad @495b yongs su byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495b-1: nam yang ngan song du lhung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495b-2: dgra thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495b-3: lan bdun bzlas na rtsod pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495b-4: dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes bco lnga la nyin mtshan thog thag gcig tu smyung bar gnas shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495b-5: khrus byas la gos gsar gtsang ma gyon nas sku gzugs kyi mdun du skyil mo klung bcas te 'dug la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495b-8: mar me la sogs pas mchod nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495b-9: byang chub snying pe'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs 'di las stong du bzlas brjod byas tshe; bzlas pa zin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495b-11: de bzhin gshegs pas phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas sgrub pa po'i spyi bor bzhag ste dbugs dbyung bar mdzad cing legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495b-15: khyod kyis bsgrub pa'i byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs legs par grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495b-18: 'bad rtsol chen pos dka' thub byas te dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:495b-19: gang 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bgrod par gyis shig ces gsungs bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496a-0: de ltar gsungs ma thag tu rig pa 'dzin pa de'i lus la 'od zer gyi phung po chen po @496a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496a-2: de nas sngags kyi rgyud thams cad las ji snyed gsungs pa'i dngos grub thams cad ma lus par grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496a-3: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496a-4: rig pa 'dzin pa des sngon mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa yin kyang de'i sdig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496a-5: sgrib pa thams cad nyin mtshan thog thag gcig la smyung ba byas shing bzlas brjod byed pa des yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496a-6: dngos grub thams cad tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496a-7: zla ba'i dmar phyogs kyi tshes bcu bzhi la lus legs par bkrus la gos gsar gtsang ma gon nas nyin mtshan thog thag gcig smyung ba byas shing sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du zangs kyi snod gcig yungs kar gyis gang bar byas te gzungs sngags 'di lan stong bzlas brjod byas pas byin gyis brlabs nas las sbyor gyi dus su klu gnas pa'i rdzing bur yungs kar de sbar gang blugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496a-8: klu de dag dga' zhing rig pa 'dzin pa de'i dbang du 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496a-9: klu'i pho brang du gdan 'dren nas zhabs la phyag bgyid nas 'dod pa thams cad ster bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496a-10: gang du gnas pa'i sa phyogs su phyi bzhin 'brangs la bka' nod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496b-0: yungs kar de phyogs bzhir gtor na rdzi @496b char drag po bzlog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496b-4: cha ga la sogs pa'i srog chags ma rungs pa thams cad kyi kha bcing bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496b-5: yungs kar me la btab na me mi sbar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496b-6: chu klung la btab na chu rgyun chad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496b-7: tshong pa'i nor rdzas la btab na chom rkun gyis mi khyer /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496b-9: rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo la gtor na rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496b-11: blon po 'khor dang bcas pa dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496b-12: nya ma pho mo'i tshogs la gtor na thams cad bdag la mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496b-14: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs la gtor na dgra thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496b-15: lam du zhugs tshe 'phrang sgor gtor na srung mis mi mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496b-16: zhing la gtor na srog chags ma rungs pa'i kha bcings par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496b-17: than pa byung tshe klu gnas pa'i chur blugs na gru char 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496b-19: rdzi char drag po babs tshe bar snang la gtor na mod la zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496b-20: dgra'i khyim la gtor na 'khon yongs su zhi bar 'gyur te phyin chad mdza' bshes su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496b-21: grong khyer gyi sgo la gtor na de'i nang gnas kyi sems can gang dag gnod pas gtses pa thams cad gnod pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:496b-23: srin po rnams ni phyogs phyogs su byer bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:497a-0: @497a *// g-yul sprad pa'i tshe pha rol po'i phyogs su gtor na dgra bo pham zhing rang phyogs brgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:497a-2: rtsod pa byed tshe khar bcug na ngag btsan zhing chos phyogs thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:497a-3: chu la blugs nas nad kyis zin pa dag la 'thung du bcug na nad de zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:497a-4: gdon gyis zin pa rnams la yungs kar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:497a-5: ka ra bsres pas bdugs na gdon thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:497a-6: ba lang la sogs pa phyugs kyi rims dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:497a-8: bu mo'i rims ngan thams cad la yungs kar sa dang bsres nas lam gyi bzhi mdor bsregs na rims nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:497a-9: gtsug phud kyi nang du bcug na gang du phyin sar skye bo thams cad dga' zhing mgu nas bdag la mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:497a-11: ci zer ba mnyan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:497a-13: rig pa 'dzin pas tshes bcu bzhi'i mtshan mo'i cha nas brtsams te lag pa gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i sku gzugs kyi zhabs la 'jus shing phyi nyin tshes bco lnga'i tho rangs kyi bar du bar mi chad par bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:497b-0: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'ongs nas 'dod @497b pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:497b-1: byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje'i zhabs la 'jus shing gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pa'i gu gul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:497b-2: zhun mar sbyar bas bdug pa phul na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:497b-3: byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje de'i mdun du lus snang bar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:497b-4: 'dod pa thams cad stsol bar byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:497b-5: las thams cad grub par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:497b-6: bu bzhin du skyong zhing gsang sngags kyi rgyud yongs su gtad par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:497b-7: gnod sbyin nor bu bzang po la 'jus shing bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na nor gyi phung po rgya chen po dang bcas lus snang bar byas te nor chen po ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:497b-8: rnam thos kyi bu'i mgo la bzhag ste aa ka ru nag po'i dud pas bdug cing lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na gser srang stong rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:497b-9: dpal gyi lha mo'i gdong la blta zhing stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na yang gser srang stong rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:497b-11: tshon sna lngas gnod sbyin gyi gzugs bris la lan stong dang nyi shu bzla zhing sa rdzar dza'i spos kyis bdugs na gnod sbyin mo mdun du byung nas mngags gzhug tu khas blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:497b-12: ci bcol ba'i las rnam pa brgya'am stong yang rung ste ma lus par grub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:497b-13: da ni ras bris kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:498a-0: ras bris la brten nas las thams cad sgrub @498a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:498a-2: kha tshar ma nyams shing longs ma spyad pa'i ras gtsang ma srid du gru bzhi yod pa zhig lpags pa las byung ba min pa'i sbyin gtsong mas btul zhing legs par brdar ba la bzo bo gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la gnas shing gtsang spra dang ldan pas bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:498a-3: dbus su sh'akya thub pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i byang chub ljon shing gi drung na seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:498a-4: de'i steng na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya can bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:498a-5: g-yas su 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:498a-6: padma'i gdan la pus mo btsugs te lag pa gnyis kyis lhung bzed bzung nas bcom ldan 'das la 'bul ba'i rnam pa can bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:498a-7: g-yon na 'phags pa gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khro 'dzum brjid bag can rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:498a-8: lag na rdo rje gsor ba'i tshul gyis bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:498a-9: padma'i gdan la pus mo gnyis btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:498a-10: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rgyab tu rin po che'i mchod rten mtho zhing yangs pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:498b-0: de'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu @498b rgyas pa'i gser zhal mchog tu dpa' ba'i 'od zer rgyal mtshan gyi tog seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs shing dbugs dbyung mdzad pa'i rnam pa can bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:498b-1: lag na rdo rje'i rgyab tu byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi glegs bam rin po che sna tshogs kyis spa ba'i rin po che'i za ma tog gi nang du bcug pa mtha' 'jags su sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bris pa seng+ge'i khri la bzhag pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:498b-2: de'i 'og tu rdo rje pho nya khro bo'i gzugs can bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:498b-3: mchod rten gyi 'og tu dpal gyi lha mo bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:498b-4: sh'akya thub pa'i 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi rin po che'i go cha gyon pa dpa' zhing brjid pa'i nyams can bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:498b-5: de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po lag pa g-yon pa na spos snod thogs pa g-yas pas bgrang phreng bsnams pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal la blta ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:498b-6: de ltar bris sku bsgrub pa tsam gyis dam pa'i chos spangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:498b-7: 'phags pa la skur pa btab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:498b-8: mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa la sogs pa ngan song gsum du ltung bar gyur pa'i las thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:498b-9: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499a-0: ras bris bsgrub pa tsam gyi phan yon de ltar na de'i mdun du sgrub pa byed pa'i phan yon smos kyang ci dgos @499a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499a-1: te; de bzhin gshegs pa dang skal ba mnyam par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499a-3: 'di'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs par 'dod pas gtsug lag khang ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499a-5: ri sul la sogs dben zhing gtsang la yid du 'ong ba'i gnas su rgyud nas gsungs pa'i cho ga bzhin sa blangs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499a-6: gzungs sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa gtsang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499a-7: ba lci bsres pas khor yug tu khru bcu drug yod pa'i stegs bu byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499a-8: der gtsang sbra dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499a-9: de'i dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499a-15: byang sgor me tog so ma 'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499a-18: dus kyi me tog bkram par bya'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499a-20: phye ma phur ma yang bsham mo //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499b-1: zhal zas bza' btung bzang po sder ma bzhi yang bkod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499b-2: sgo bzhir bdug spos kyi phog phor bzhi gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499b-3: me tog sna tshogs kyi chun po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499b-4: dkar gsum gyi gtor ma yang bsham par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499b-5: yang zur bzhir mar me bzhi bud par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499b-7: kha shar du bltas te bzlas brjod bya bar bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499b-8: mtshan gyi thun tha ma la lus bsrung ba dang mtshams bcing ba sogs byas nas dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499b-9: dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis sdig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499b-10: sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499b-11: dngos grub thams cad bde blag thob pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499b-12: bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499b-13: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rtag tu dgongs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499b-14: 'byung po thams cad kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499b-15: lha thams cad kyis bsrung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499b-17: sba bar byed cing sgrub pa'i stong grogs byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499b-18: dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:499b-19: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta by'a ba lo ki te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:500a-12: ao bi dza ya ga p'i sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:500a-14: aom ta th'a ga ta dza ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:500a-15: gtsug tor bcing ba'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:500a-16: aom dza ya au ri ti sv'ah'a /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:500a-18: aom gu ru dha ri sv'ah'a /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:500a-20: aom dha ra dha ra mi ri dza ye sv'ah'a /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:500a-22: aom su sambha wa dza ye sv'ah'a /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:500a-24: aom su na ri dza ya ye sv'ah'a /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:500a-28: aom pra wa r'a dza ye siddhi sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:500a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:500a-30: aom raksha ni dza ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:500a-32: aom dza ya di bi ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:500a-34: aom ma le bi ma la dza ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:500b-0: aom sa ra sa ra ja @500b ye siddhi sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:500b-1: yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:500b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:500b-4: nye ba'i snying po'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:500b-5: snying po 'bum bzlas na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:500b-6: ldong ros zangs kyi snod du bzhag pa snying po stong bzlas pas brlabs nas dpral bar thig le byas na nam mkha' la 'gro zhing lha srin sde brgyad thams cad kyi khyim sgo rang gis bye bar 'gyur te sgrub pa bos ci dgar 'jug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:500b-8: soo b'i ra mig sman la 'bum bzlas nas mig la byugs na aanta na 'thob par gyur la 'byung po thams cad kyi khyim du rang dbang gis 'jug nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:500b-9: gzhan yang khri bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:500b-10: mchod rten gyi srog shing gi rtse mo'i gdugs la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas bteg byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel ma lus par bzhugs pa'i mchod rten chen po'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:500b-11: 'jam dpal gyi phyag mtshan lhung bzed blangs nas de la sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la 'o thug gis gang bar byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:501a-1: 'jog ste gdugs tshad 'bul na bsod snyoms pa stong yang tshim bar 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:501a-4: da ni phyag rgya'i rim pa bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:501a-5: lag pa gnyis thal mo gan rkyal du byas la snying ga'i thad du thal mo g-yas pa'i mthil na g-yon pa yang gan rkyal du bzed de bzhag pa ni byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:501a-6: phyag rgya 'di bcing ba tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:501a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbugs dbyung bar mdzad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:501a-8: phyag rgya des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskul bar 'gyur zhing /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:501a-10: phyag rgya de nyid las lag pa g-yas pa bteg ste phyag rgya gzhan gang dgos su bsgyur bas phyag rgya thams cad byung bar gyur te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:501b-0: phyag rgya de nyid las lag pa g-yas pa bsgyur nas lte bar bzhag pa'i mtheb chen dang @501b mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun du sbyar ba ni phyag rgya las thams cad pa'i phyag rgya ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs shing las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:501b-1: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gzungs 'di bsrung zhing mtshams sbyor pa'i gzungs sngags 'di smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:501b-2: na mo manydzu shr'i ya ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:501b-3: ku m'a ra bh'u ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:501b-10: sgrub pa pos thog mar 'jug pa'i skabs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:501b-11: las la sbyor ba'i skabs rnams su sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas na sgrib pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:501b-12: bgegs med par 'gyur zhing myur du grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:501b-13: de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes rig pa chen po'i gzungs 'di smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:501b-16: ha na da ha pa tsa badzra h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:501b-17: sngags 'di yungs kar la lan bdun btab nas phyogs bzhir gtor na na mtshams bcing gi mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:501b-18: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis sngags 'di smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:501b-20: dhri ti hri mri sa ra pra sa ra bi ri bi ri sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502a-0: sngags 'di yungs kar dang bcas pa'i chu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la spyi bo nas blugs na gnod byed 'byung po thams cad dbang du gyur nas sgrub pa po'i rkang par mgo pos phyag 'tshal @502a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502a-1: nas rang gnas su gdongs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502a-4: ngas mdo 'di bshad pa ni bsod nams zhan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502a-9: mtshams med pa byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502a-14: mtshams med par 'gro ba'i sems can de lta bu dag gi phyir gzungs 'di bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502a-16: phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe khyim na gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502a-17: dge slong las phal cher gzungs 'di mi klog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502a-18: mchod par mi byed pa rnams ji ltar khyim pa rnams sdug bsngal bar bshad pa de bzhin du rab tu byung ba rnams kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502a-19: de ste de bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod cing 'di la brten pas mchod rten gcig byas na chos kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502a-21: bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502a-22: sdong pos brgyan pa bklags shing kha ton du byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502a-24: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang zhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502b-0: bcom ldan @502b 'das kyis mdo sde 'di bka' stsal nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502b-1: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502b-2: gsang ba'i bdag po chen po phyag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502b-3: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502b-4: bram ze bi tu datta dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502b-6: klu la sogs pa'i sde brgyad mi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502b-7: mi ma yin pa thams cad rjes su yi rangs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502b-9: 'phags pa byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502b-10: thang gur gyi dus the tsin zhi hung lu khing gos can rgya gar byang phyogs kyi mkhan po sde snod gsum pa rig 'dzin don yod rdo rjes bka' yis bskul ba dang du blangs te rgya gar gyi dpe las rgya nag tu bsgyur bar mdzad pa las da lta chen po ching gur gyi ltsho ts'ar sgro btags pa bod yig gi slob gra'i mi bzang jing gir rigs las rim pa dang po'i tha'i ji mgon po skyabs kyis thob chin wang gis gzungs bsdus gsar ba bzhengs skabs 'phros don las brtsams te bskul ba ltar /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502b-11: rang gnas nyi dga'i skyed tshal du bsgyur ba lags shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:502b-12: legs sbyar gyi sgra la ma byang bas sngags tshig gi lci yang sogs la rtog dpyod byed pa'i ngal ba spangs te snga rabs pa dag gi mdo gzhan gyi yi ge ji ltar ngo sprod gnang ba sor bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:503a-0: @503a *// kun dga' bo'i tshig lhu gcig ni rgya nag mar mi snang yang bod mar yod pas chad dam snyam pas bod ma nas tshur bsabs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:503a-1: de yang gzhung gi bka' 'gyur par mar dga' bo zhes pa 'dug kyang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:503a-2: bris ma 'ga' zhig na kun dga' bo snang ba 'thad dam snyam du sems pa ltar bris pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:503a-3: badzra a'a yu she'i sngags ni rgya nag gi dpe chan med cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:503a-4: bod dper yod kyang snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:503a-5: nye snying gi rjes la byung mod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:503a-6: rang tshugs kyi ming mi gsal bas re zhig gzhag te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:503a-7: khi'an lung gnam lo brgyad pa zla ba bdun pa'i tshes bdun la rdzogs par bsgrubs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:503a-8: dge ba 'di yis skye bo kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:503a-9: bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:503a-10: bsod nams ye shes las byung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:503a-11: dam pa sku gnyis thob par shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:503a-12: 'og gi byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum 'di yang 'di las zur phyung zhig yin 'dug pas logs su bri ma dgos kyang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-012:503a-13: sngar gyi rnams su gong ma ma rnyed pa'i skabs su bris 'dug pa ltar bzhag go /
